mapper.sql: g.id sku_id,g.sku_code,g.goods_name,g.goods_varieties,g.goods_spec,g.goods_origin,g.goods_unit, g.goods_shipping,g.sale_price,g.label_price,g.cost_price, a1.attr_name goods_varieties_desc, a2.attr_name goods_spec_desc, a3.attr_name goods_origin_desc, a4.attr_name goods_shipping_desc

sql.where:
g.is_delete=0 and g.is_valid=1
and g.sku_code like '%${skuCode}%'
and g.goods_name like '%${goodsName}%'
and g.goods_varieties = '${goodsVarieties}'
and g.goods_spec = '${goodsSpec}'
and g.goods_origin = '${goodsOrigin}'

mapper.select:
select from info_goods_sku g left join info_goods_attribute a1 on a1.attr_type_code='info_goods_sku.goods_varieties' and a1.attr_code=g.goods_varieties left join info_goods_attribute a2 on a2.attr_type_code='info_goods_sku.goods_spec' and a2.attr_code=g.goods_spec left join info_goods_attribute a3 on a3.attr_type_code='info_goods_sku.goods_origin' and a3.attr_code=g.goods_origin left join info_goods_attribute a4 on a4.attr_type_code='info_goods_sku.goods_shipping' and a4.attr_code=g.goods_shipping
order by g.goods_code,g.goods_varieties,g.goods_spec,g.goods_origin,g.goods_shipping limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}

select count(1) from info_goods_sku g left join info_goods_attribute a1 on a1.attr_type_code='info_goods_sku.goods_varieties' and a1.attr_code=g.goods_varieties left join info_goods_attribute a2 on a2.attr_type_code='info_goods_sku.goods_spec' and a2.attr_code=g.goods_spec left join info_goods_attribute a3 on a3.attr_type_code='info_goods_sku.goods_origin' and a3.attr_code=g.goods_origin left join info_goods_attribute a4 on a4.attr_type_code='info_goods_sku.goods_shipping' and a4.attr_code=g.goods_shipping

select from info_goods_sku g left join info_goods_attribute a1 on a1.attr_type_code='info_goods_sku.goods_varieties' and a1.attr_code=g.goods_varieties left join info_goods_attribute a2 on a2.attr_type_code='info_goods_sku.goods_spec' and a2.attr_code=g.goods_spec left join info_goods_attribute a3 on a3.attr_type_code='info_goods_sku.goods_origin' and a3.attr_code=g.goods_origin left join info_goods_attribute a4 on a4.attr_type_code='info_goods_sku.goods_shipping' and a4.attr_code=g.goods_shipping
order by g.goods_code,g.goods_varieties,g.goods_spec,g.goods_origin,g.goods_shipping
mapper.update:
update info_goods_sku
sale_price = #{salePrice},
label_price = #{labelPrice},
cost_price = #{costPrice},
memo = #{memo},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_user = #{updateUser},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
where id = ${id}
